greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array read by antidiagonals, m>=0, n>=0, A(m,n) = sum{k=0..n} sum{j=0..m} sum{i=0..m} (-1)^(j+i)*C(i,j)*n^j*k^(m-j).
maple: pow := (a,b) -> if a=0 and b=0 then 1 else a^b fi;
for m from 0 to 8 do lprint(seq(A198061(m,n), n=0..6)) od;
mathematica: Unprotect[Power]; 0^0 = 1; Protect[Power]; a[m_, n_] :=  Sum[(-1)^(j+i)*Binomial[i, j]*n^j*k^(m-j) , {i, 0, m}, {j, 0, m}, {k, 0, n}]; Table[a[m-n, n], {m, 0, 10}, {n, 0, m}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 26 2013 *)
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Nov 02 2011
